global_hint_policy.unlock_conditions: Hints unlock after two wrong attempts OR by spending a 'token' earned via optional micro-tasks (e.g., listening to a 30s clip). Hints quote short supportive/funny lines from the chat and are presented in-character (Harley sweet or Joker taunt). Example: 'effort is my love language' as a gentle nudge. :contentReference[oaicite:66]{index=66}
global_hint_policy.hint_style: Hints escalate: first is soft (Phoebe quote), second is snarky (Joker-taunt) and costs a token or level-time penalty.

visual: downloadable certificate: 'Phoebe â€” Harley Queen of the Circus'

Everything here is drawn directly from your chat export so the answers feel unmistakably private. Good luck â€” Joker would be proud. :contentReference[oaicite:67]{index=67} :contentReference[oaicite:68]{index=68} :contentReference[oaicite:69]{index=69}
